venue.name: The Regattabar at the Charles Hotel

item.description:
Ecuadorian singer, composer and bassist Alex Alvear brings his high-powered MANGO BLUE and it's unique and infectious brand of Afro-Latin and World music. The band's all-original repertoire offers a mix of Funk, R&B and Jazz with a strong Afro-Latin rhythmic foundation. Songs of celebration, love and social conscience. Hip music to listen, great music to dance.

Get tickets here ($18):

http://www.getshowtix.com/regattabar/moreinfo.cgi?id=2537

There are 2 shows this night, but I'm posting for the 7:30pm show as more may be available for this time...Let's also roam over to Casablanca's if people want to for a post-meetup afterparty :)
item.name: Alex Alvear & Mango Blue at Regattabar
